Dear Sharon and Hagop,

 

Hope all is well

 

Could you please share with us the branch TL and the Insurance policy for Lacoste and Swarovski at Abu Dhabi Mall?

 

1.	Abu Dhabi Mall Branch Trade License or Trade Name Reservation Certificate& Initial Approval from Abu Dhabi Municipality (If Trade License is not yet obtained for AUH Mall)
2.	Copy of Insurance Policy for Abu Dhabi Mall as follows: 

	a.	Third Party Liability Insurance (Coverage not less than 5 Million)
	b.	Property All Risk

 

Thanks and Best regards,
Rose
